description: This file defines a UI component named 'TitleList' using LightningJS framework. It renders a list of title items with their category and year, providing a selectable UI element.

classes.name: TitleList
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays a list of titles with categories and years, allowing user selection.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Emits a 'select' event with the chosen item when a title is selected.
